Now this is really strange, I'm trying to download this, but it won't let me. It has an error message that says, "There is not enough space on the disk." And that's weird because I have about 140 GB of memory left on my hard drive, and I'm using uTorrent, which I've not had a problem with before. Anyone else have this problem?

Is your hard drive formatted as FAT32 or NTFS.
A Fat32 drive won't let you save a file bigger than 4 Gigs, so if tis is the case, format the drive to NTFS.

And yes it's in ENGLISH.
